headline.main: Marijuana Smoking Said to Have Power To Deter Glaucoma

docs.abstract: Univ of Calif Med School and Natl Health Insts researchers rept that marijuana smoking reduces fluid prssure in eyes and may prevent glaucoma, significant cause of blindees, meeting of Internatl Cong of Pharmacology; experiment described; glaucoma and its symptoms noted; researchers note that if further studies confirm initial findings, problem will be to develop non-intoxicating derivative to use as medication
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, July 27 (UPI) -- Marijuana smoking reduces fluid pressure in the eyes and may prevent glaucoma, a significant cause of blindness, researchers reported yesterday.
docs.snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, July 27 (UPI) -- Marijuana smoking reduces fluid pressure in the eyes and may prevent glaucoma, a significant cause of blindness, researchers reported yesterday.
